column5: We invite you to relax on our 80 acre Estate in the scenic Texas Hill Country. The first floor features a kitchen, quiet living area, master bedroom with queen size bed, bathroom and a patio overlooking the vineyard. Travel up a spiral staircase to the loft where two additional queen size beds are located. Breakfast is not included but, we welcome you to make reservations to dine at our on-site Bistro (Open Thursday - Sunday).    POLICIES:  NO PETS / NO CHILDREN / NO SMOKING
